name: Extended Membership Directory for Paid Memberships Pro
author: eighty20results

sections.description:
Exending the Extended Membership Directory for Paid Memberships Pro plugin to support filtered search fields for specific user meta data fields.

.
sections.changelog:
1.6

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add check for the other (standard) Member Directory add-on presence
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Added partial French translation
  3. BUG FIX: Avoid namespace collisions with standard directory

1.5.1

  1. BUG FIX: Only attempt to load extra search fields if they've been defined
  2. BUG FIX: Typo in $orderby variable (should be $order_by)
  3. BUG FIX: Sanitize search info when looking at it
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Add reset link for search form (only if search is active)
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Remove debug info

1.5

  1. BUG FIX: Make sure Search button doesn't overlay the Search field
  2. BUG FIX: Search gets clobbered by header
  3. BUG FIX: Escape URLs when printing to front end
  4. BUG FIX: Better escaping of data on front-end pages
  5. BUG FIX: Sanitize values better when printing
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Initialize variables before use
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Remove extra whitespace
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Add localization
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Force search to use precise values in query
  10. ENHANCEMENT: Allow user to specify WordPress Role(s) to use as filter for directory
  11. ENHANCEMENT: Added documentation for extra filters (pmpromd_extra_search_filters, pmpromd_exact_search_values)
  12. ENHANCEMENT: Load localization function(s)
  13. ENHANCEMENT: Use plugin slug (for standard version) in localization
  14. ENHANCEMENT: Fixed code style
  15. ENHANCEMENT: Explicit priority for all action hooks
  16. ENHANCEMENT: Added locatlization loader to build script

1.4

  1. ENH: Add wrapper around Search form components for more direct placement control

1.3.1

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Make sure search area is big enough.

1.3

  1. ENHANCEMENT: Add support for one-click plugin upgrade
  2. ENHANCEMENT: Add build infrastructure
  3. ENHANCEMENT: Add plugin specific constant
  4. ENHANCEMENT: Clean up the SQL statement (escape variables)
  5. ENHANCEMENT: Refactor CSS
  6. ENHANCEMENT: Fix placement of Search button
  7. ENHANCEMENT: Fix layout of Search button
  8. ENHANCEMENT: Fix placeholder text width for Select2 inputs
  9. ENHANCEMENT: Add versioned CSS file support
